NO_SUCH_FILE_OR_DIR: That file or directory doesn't exists!
ALREADY_SUCH_FILE_OR_DIR: That file or directory does already exists!
INVALID_BODY: You sent an incomplete or wrong request body (you probably want to try again)!
INVALID_NODE: No node with that ID found!
INVALID_USER: No user with that ID found!
PROBLEMS_CONNECTING_NODE: There are problems connecting to the node, please try again!
NO_PERMISSIONS: You don't have enough permissions to do that action!
REGISTERING_DISABLED: Registering is disabled! If this is your first time, please check the readme!
